page.title: 08Yattendon School
page.content: The school belongs to the Downs Federation of small Primary Schools, all of which normally pass on their leavers to he Downs Secondary School at Compton. The Federation organises Potted Sports in the summer for all the schools to take part. This year the first and second years went to Hermitage, and the third and fourth years to Chieveley. It also arranges a "Work Week" or school trip for the third and fourth years. This was at Fairthorne Manor near Hamble in Hampshire. It was an activities week in which we had a go at canoeing, archery, rock-climbing, orienteering, the assault courseand the death slide. We also visited a country museum and H.M.S. Victory. Ten children went from Yattendon, four fourth years and all but one of the third years.
